para_sentences.para_0: Teams  is a forum for more informal interaction with your fellow students. It is also where TAs and the Instructors will hold office hours.
para_sentences.para_1: You can download and install the desktop or mobile app from   here  .  or also use it from the browser.
para_sentences.para_2: There are multiple methods to connect to Teams.  We recommend using the desktop application and mobile app. You can find links to download these at our   University IT Teams Site  (Links to an external site.)   Alternately, entering the URL   https://teams.microsoft.com  (Links to an external site.)   in your web browser will allow you to log on using your ONID credentials without downloading an application, but notifications don't work as well using this method.
para_sentences.para_4: There is a link to Ed Discussions in the left navigation of Canvas. This ongoing Q&A forum is a valuable resource for getting official answers to your questions (and often helpful student responses also). It's good to use the search box before posting, to see if your question has already been addressed.

ul_0: Follow the instructions on 'Connect to Class Team' page in the start here module to join Class Team

heading_sentences: Start Here - Microsoft Teams and Ed Discussions
